meanings.sent1: The party had an unmerry atmosphere, with everyone looking sad.
meanings.sent2: She tried to smile, but her face remained unmerry.
meanings.sent3: The clown's attempt at an unmerry face made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds painted an unmerry sky over the town.
meanings.sent5: The unmerry news of the storm dampened their spirits.

meanings.sent1: The unmerry holiday decorations didn't bring much joy to the room.
meanings.sent2: His unmerry expression hinted at the troubles he was facing.
meanings.sent3: The unmerry cat refused to play with the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The unmerry melody of the song matched his somber mood.
meanings.sent5: The unmerry silence in the room made her feel lonely.
